name: Horde Of Thunder
description:
Working with the aspects of Fantasy, Medieval & SciFi, we hereby bring you the craziest tower defense game which sets foot in a beautiful fantasy enviroment. Your castle needs a Defender. Do you have what it takes? - to fight of the evil Horde of Thunder, which consist of orcs, zombies, ghosts, dragons, even tanks! - which will stop at nothing, to invade and cast you from the throne.

Are you ready to Fight and Crush this fierce enemy by unleashing your Ultimate set of towers and upgrades?

GAME FEATURES

- Build and upgrade your towers to strengthen your defense against the unstoppable army of evil monsters.

- Earn more money by slaying the invaders and surviving every Wave. Each completed wave will grant you an additional gold bonus.

- Amazing graphics and Stunning level design.

- A Powerful and Crazy collection of towers, like Gunners, Cannons, Tesla Coils, Mortar, Flamers, and more, with a Total of 40+ Upgrades.

- Free game updates, which will expand the game with more Levels, Towers, and Monsters.

GAMEPLAY

- Pan around the level by using your fingers

- Drag N' Drop the towers on multiple locations in the enviroment.

- Stratetic and Tactical gameplay at its best.

- Survive 50 Waves and prove yourself right as the Ultimate Tower Defense Commander.
